expo.name: FloraMind: AI Plants
expo.description: FloraMind revolutionizes plant care with advanced AI intelligence, instant species identification, health diagnosis, and personalized care recommendations. The most sophisticated plant care app powered by machine learning.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FloraMind needs photo access to analyze your plants using advanced AI intelligence for health diagnosis and care recommendations
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FloraMind uses your camera to capture plant photos for AI-powered health analysis, species identification, and personalized care insights
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: FloraMind may use microphone for voice notes about your plant care observations and AI-powered plant intelligence features
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FloraMind uses your location to provide weather-based plant care recommendations and optimize AI plant intelligence for your local environment
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: FloraMind uses tracking to provide personalized plant care recommendations and improve AI accuracy
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: FloraMind can create plant care reminders in your calendar for optimal care scheduling
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: FloraMind can share plant care insights with friends and family through your contacts

plugins.photosPermission: FloraMind analyzes your plant photos using advanced AI intelligence to provide health diagnostics, species identification, and personalized care recommendations.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: FloraMind uses your location to provide weather-based plant care recommendations and optimize AI plant intelligence for your local environment and growing conditions.
